message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $950000 seems a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $950000 might be a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $875000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $850000. Can you consider that price?

I understand that $850000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $900000. I believe this is the best compromise considering the product's value. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
